courses.title: Extend DAML Models with Packages
courses.description: Extend a DAML model with a feature contained in a new package and upload it to a running application.

courses.title: Upgrade DAML Models and Migrate a Live Application
courses.description: Learn how to upgrade a DAML model and migrate a running application.

courses.description: Extend your UI to carry out upgrades
